eeth jarmaniye ayarlantha janaya samalingika wiwahayata hisa namayi samalingika wiwaha nithigatha kala yuthuda nadda yanna thiranaya kirimata pawathi janamatha wicharanayedi ayarlantha wasiyan mala sirurak samanga charikawe yeduna dedeneku thamun wisin pudgalika aarawulak matha ghathanaya kala ayekuge mala sirura wan rathayakin prawahanaya karamin sitiyadi uyan wawe gili dedeneku maruta hakmana gangodagama pradeshaye uyan wawe namata giya tharunayan dedeneku diye gilima hethuwen jiwithakshayata pathwa rajakiyayangen warthawak wasara 13 kata pera thaman wisinma thabu warthawak binda helamin wasara pahakata pasu bradbi kirulalaba ganimata kolambaa thawaduratath wasi heta (24) dinaya thula basnahira, sabaragamuwa, dakuna saha madhyama palathwala wasi wara kipayak athi wana athara aparabhagayedi jayalalitha nawatha maha amathi putuwe thamilnadu hitapu maha amathini jayalalitha jeyaram nawathath ema pranthaye maha amathi lesa ada (23) diwrum dunna.

1945 idala barmiyuda thrikonaya thiyana pradeshaye di athurudahan wunu dewal atharata guwan yana,nrukawan saha minissu dahas gananak bawa sadahan wenawa.pudumaya wenne me athurudahan wunu kisima deyaka eka kallak wath hoya ganna bari wela thiyenawa.hoya gaththe naw bottu swalpayak kiyala thamayi sadahan wenne.me gana wiwidha pudgalayan wiwidha aayathana ekinakata wenas aakarayen thamange matha idiripath karala thiyenawa.

ee kale man hitiye namaya wasare,ethakota diyokubadu sar thamayi ape shreni bharawa idiye.giya aathme karapu kujitha wadakatada manda mata sarwa pennanna ba,sarta mawa pennannath ba.ee mokada kiyanawanan bas waladi hu thiyala,shart eke batn aran idala,loku kolloth ekka bajaw dala,piriyad kat karala ahuwela wage, apita sini bola eeth sarlata kakki bola prashna nisa....ee kale man igenagaththe kadda midiyam panthiye.hari shok panthiya,kisi waliyakata prashnekata gawunewath nathi panthiya.pirimi lamayi kiyala wenasak nathiwa unuth gan lamayi wage hitiya, ow un al wathurath niwalayi biwwe.api karana kiyana hora wada mattu wenne nathiwa karagena hamadama hoda lamayi una.panthiye lamayi wisi namayayi idiye.manthuma hamawarema wisi ata.....kiyanna sathutuyi ne???

nawa wasarata loka wasi siyaluma dena wetha theruwana sarana pathime aramunen landan nuwara mahamewnawa jathyanthara bhawana asapuwa mangin desambar 31 wanadina pawathwu dharmadeshanawa saha sarwarathrika pirith deshanaya sandaha athi wishala sadahawathun pirisak sahabhagi wi atha.

derate pawathwena poth pradarshanawalata sahabhagiwimath, deratema pala wena usas kruthi pariwarthanaya kara derata thula wyaptha kirimath ema awabodhatha giwisume aramuna we.china amathi jiaang juanguoo mahatha adahas pala karamin poth prakashana kshethraye niyalunu prawina niyojitha pirisak shri lankawata paminiye prathama wathawata bawath shri lankawe ek poth prakashakayaku wisin china kruthi 17k sinhala bhashawen palakara thibima sathutata karunak bawath sandahan kaleya.shri lanka poth prakashakayange sangamaye sabhapathi wijitha yapa mahatha katha karamin, nawadilliye pawathi loka poth pradarshanaye di landan poth pradarshanayedi da awasthawa labunu bawath juni masa 18 wani dina sita koriyawe sol nuwara pawathwena koriyanu jathyanthara poth pradarshanayata da apage niyojitha kandayamak sahabhagi wana bawath 2014 sapthambar masa 13 wani dina pawathwena kolambaa jathyanthara poth pradarshanayata da wideshiya poth prakashakayin wishala washayen sahabhagi wana bawath prakasha kaleya.china rajaye prawruththi paripalana, prakashana, guwanwiduli chithrapata rupawahini upa amathi jiaang juanguoo mahatha saha shri lanka poth prakashakayange sangamaye sabhapathi wijitha yapa mahatha me awabodhatha giwisumata assan thabu awasthawa.

ehi sabhapathi kumudu fonseka mahatha sandahan kale janadhipathithumage madihathwimen katar rajaya mema pasala sandaha nawa idamak ha awashya godanagili laba dimata ekanga wi athi bawayi.pasala sandaha anugrahakathwaya laba denu labanne katar rajyaye shri lanka thanapathi karyalayayi.mema widyalayata janapathi aaryawak pamini prathama awasthawa meya wana athara, rajapaksha mathiniyage paminima widyalaye du daruwanta mahath sanasimak ha uddamayata karunak wiya.janapathi aaryawa athin widyalaye nawa pariganaka eekakaya wiwrutha kirima da mehidi sidu wiya.anathuruwa widyalaye dakshatha dakwu sisu daru dariyanta, widyalaye abhiwruddhiya udesa mahangu sewayak itukala aacharyawarun ha anugrahaya dakwu danapathin sandaha wishesha thilina pradanayak da janapathi aaryawa athin sidu wiya.shri lankika du daruwan wenuwen janapathi aaryawa itukarana wishishta sewaya agayima udesa widyalayiya aacharya mandalaya wisin rajapaksha mathiniya wetha wishesha thilinayak da pradanaya kerini.
